channel.title: Attempting to learn Java, need help though
channel.description:
Okay, JAVA is unlike the languages I know, since it's all program - related and requires compiling and such. I went through the tutorial of the "Hello World" thing, it compiled right, but now how do I make a java applet say "Hello World" on a web page with what I did?
[code] class HelloWorldApp { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello World!"); } } [/code]
<applet width="512" height="344" code="HelloWorldApp.class"> </applet> [code] load: HelloWorldApp.class is not public or has no public constructor. java.lang.IllegalAccessException: Class sun.applet.AppletPanel can not access a member of class HelloWorldApp with modifiers "" at sun.reflect.Reflection.ensureMemberAccess(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Attempting to learn Java, need help though
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:2, topic:93232”]Go to moparisthebest.com
This is for private servers, not java help…[/quote]

This is my first step to even considering editting servers, aswell as extending the RSC one. I know many server-side languages well, but none require a special way of being displayed NOR compiling, so this is my first step. Thanks anyway.

item.title: Attempting to learn Java, need help though
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

Okay, JAVA is unlike the languages I know, since it’s all program - related and requires compiling and such. I went through the tutorial of the “Hello World” thing, it compiled right, but now how do I make a java applet say “Hello World” on a web page with what I did?

class HelloWorldApp {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Hello World!");
    }
}
[code] load: HelloWorldApp.class is not public or has no public constructor. java.lang.IllegalAccessException: Class sun.applet.AppletPanel can not access a member of class HelloWorldApp with modifiers "" at sun.reflect.Reflection.ensureMemberAccess(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
